website_summaries.verdict: Exceptional value. Delivers the same kind of heating performance as more expensive models, but it comes at nearly half the cost.
pros: A fireplace with a design that fits a multitude of room styles
If you have an existing standard fireplace, it will slip in like a glove
cons: The beep that accompanies a selection is a bit loud and can take some getting used to

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. It has many different settings and the heater is amazing! Highly recommended!!! UPDATE: Sadly, I have to change my post from 5 to 2 stars. I've had the unit for little over a month and it's making a clicking noise that is becoming louder and louder. The insert is already built into my fireplace, so if I need to replace it, I will have to rip away the molding. This is very disappointing. Will be calling customer service today,
customer_reviews.author: Ania Broz-St

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this item because my house is freezing, ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item because my house is freezing, and this particular unit received stellar reviews on consumer reports. Truth be told, my hairdryer puts out more heat than this thing! I ended up purchasing a $20 small, industrial unit that puts out a ton of heat and kept this unit to add ambiance to my home during the dark, depressing winter months. Everyone loves it who sees it. However, if you're looking to warm your home, this isn't it. It couldn't even warm my living room -- and my place isn't that big.

customer_reviews.title: Fireplace looks just as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: This item looks just like it did on the computer and I am satisfied with it. I am using in a master bedroom and love the look of an actual fireplace; however it does not put out as much heat as I thought it would. Being a woman of 77 and having had back surgery it did take me a little longer to assemble but all I had to use was a screwdriver. Someone younger could have done it in much less time,. All in all I am very pleased with this fireplace. pb
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis B. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Used it twice and now it won’t work
customer_reviews.text: We bought this fireplace insert to replace one in our fifth wheel... We received in January installed it in June before the camping season...We never needed to use it this summer and turned it One morning in late august.... We were camping Labor Day weekend and tried to turn it on one morning and it would not come on... Husband tried to troubleshoot it but there is no fuses in it to replace... We are now doing some fall camping which is why I wanted the fireplace and now it does not work very very unhappy
customer_reviews.author: K. Dostie

customer_reviews.title: The unit is beautiful. The heat output is great
customer_reviews.text: The unit is beautiful. The heat output is great. The only problem that I have is that when you turn only the fire feature on (without heat) it is uncomfortably loud.
customer_reviews.author: David215

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Ok so this looks awesome however buyer BEWARE this stupid thing keeps cutting off we thought our contractor had placed it in the fireplace too close and didn’t have clearance for the vent on top.....but no we had him tear the whole dang fireplace out and make sure there was clearance only for this dumb thing to stop working 😡🤬
customer_reviews.author: BRIDGETTE J

customer_reviews.title: They look great and arrive fast
customer_reviews.text: They look great and arrive fast, bought four but one didn't work. Emailed the company over a month ago about the non working one and haven't gotten a response from them as of yet. I guess I'm just stuck with one that doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: gene clark

customer_reviews.title: No thermostat
customer_reviews.text: For what this is...highly overpriced. The biggest drawback is you can’t set the heater temperature. It’s either sweat mode or off! Shops for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Ebba Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Nice and relaxing
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure on this just went off the reviews. We absolutely love it. So relaxing love how you can dim it down and if you are 10 -15 ft back it will heat the area real nice
customer_reviews.author: Joel Asher

customer_reviews.title: Very very loud fan.
customer_reviews.text: The fan in this product is so loud that you will have trouble watching TV or listening to music. I have had problems with package delivery and return as well. This was supposed to replace an older product from another vendor who was so quiet and lasted for 10 years, so I have experience with this type of product.
customer_reviews.author: Coffee Lover S

customer_reviews.title: Look and feels like a gas fireplace
customer_reviews.text: Look and feels like a gas fireplace!!! Excellent product, wife and I are very pleased with this fireplace. It warms the room, but is not over powering like a wood stove. When our friends saw it they asked if we installed a gas fire place. I built a metal surround for it so it looks like a gas fireplace insert. It has run for 3 mouths with no problems, I would highly recommend this electric fire place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A perfect solution to the chilly nights on our lanai in ...
customer_reviews.text: A perfect solution to the chilly nights on our lanai in Naples, FL Very relaxing and reminds us of our former home in Chicago. Added a stone wall all the way to the ceiling. I estimate it increased our condo value by $100,000.00 Just kidding Ed
customer_reviews.author: EDWARD LARSON

customer_reviews.title: Overall extremely satisfied works well and I got it quickly
customer_reviews.text: A perfect addition to my remodeling project works really well fairly quiet and puts off good heat. Definitely the best bang for your buck performs as good and even better than some of the more expensive models.
customer_reviews.author: Jay shep

customer_reviews.title: This turned out to be a great product and exactly the dimensions as in add
customer_reviews.text: This turned out to be a great product and exactly the dimensions as in add. This replaced my 5 year old one in my RV. Great product and great price.
customer_reviews.author: Jathuron

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice in a room, just wish it had a little more heat output. Overall, I am pleased.
customer_reviews.text: I like the "fire" on this fireplace and it looks nice in a room. I gave it 4 stars because I wish it put out a little more heat for the size of the unit.
customer_reviews.author: TKru

customer_reviews.title: It does not heat more than one room
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be bigger and I thought there was a remote with it but there was not
customer_reviews.author: Lisa ewert

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Looks are deceiving, looked good in the picture but it is a piece of junk and assembly was a nightmare. BUYER BEWARE.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing quality
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what I was looking for and worked great for the first couple of years but then the fan stopped working and it apparently needs a whole new circuit board. I would have expected better quality and a longer life span than less than three years for such an item.
customer_reviews.author: Amy L Hiltunen

customer_reviews.title: Ankdy does not honor their product warranty
customer_reviews.text: 2nd one that has failed. Ankdy didn’t respond for warranty. Stay away from this company and there products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad unit
customer_reviews.text: The flames have a repetitive pattern. That is probably something one would see on all units like this though. It is reasonably quiet. My wife is happy with it so enough said.
customer_reviews.author: good old boy

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty heater
customer_reviews.text: I wish it would have had a remote. The heat is puts off is great
customer_reviews.author: stevie

customer_reviews.title: Love the ambiance
customer_reviews.text: This is a great looking addition to my room. Very easy installation and I'm ordering a second one for my other fireplace!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: We have had this for about a month. We LOVE it. It was easy to install (it was lighter than we expected). Set it in your fireplace, plug it in & turn it on!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Loved it until....
customer_reviews.text: Bought this fore place 11 months ago. We love it, but sadly today the flames decided to stop moving and they froze in place. Heater still works but looks silly now when turned on. Hope to get issue resolved with seller
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Smith

customer_reviews.title: Hiigh Quality Product.
customer_reviews.text: Very Nice Product that met all my expectations. The wife absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: CEW

customer_reviews.title: The dimensions are perfect and the "fire" element works great but when you ...
customer_reviews.text: The heat doesn't work on this item. The dimensions are perfect and the "fire" element works great but when you try to turn on the heat, it just shuts off.
customer_reviews.author: Misty H

customer_reviews.title: I love this unit very attractive throws good heat easy easy ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this unit very attractive throws good heat easy easy easy to setup and install no assembly whats not to like. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph E Cloutier

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looks great in my fireplace Can't beat the price Very pleased Linda
customer_reviews.author: Linda Stachowiak

customer_reviews.title: nice! the sq footage room warming may not be ...
customer_reviews.text: nice! the sq footage room warming may not be to accurate.. but works good it seems for now thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The flame is good, but not great, but the price is fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Save trees!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a fireplace in my apartment....placed this on the rug in my living room facing the couch and I have heat and a nice visual for while reading or TV watching. Better than a wood fireplace...no smoke or mess. Might even be better than a gas fireplace due to its mobility. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: so cool looking we love it works great every one who sees it says cool looking very very nice
customer_reviews.author: mike weeks

customer_reviews.title: It also has a vibration noise I assume to represent the sounds of fire which sounds nothing like a fire
customer_reviews.text: It does not have as large flames as the picture shows. It also has a vibration noise I assume to represent the sounds of fire which sounds nothing like a fire.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Baker

customer_reviews.title: it was nice but too big for our fireplace had to return ...
customer_reviews.text: it was nice but too big for our fireplace had to return it . if it fit your fireplace it is nice
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The look of the item is great but it does not heat very well
customer_reviews.text: The look of the item is great but it does not heat very well. It only blows out of the left side of the unit due to buttons being on the right.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: need new remote
customer_reviews.text: fireplace its self is okay but my remote does not work who do i contact about a new remote
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All I can say is my wife and I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is my wife and I love this thing. It had me asleep on the couch on 10 minutes flat on day one!
customer_reviews.author: MJG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this fireplace. It Is very realistic and beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Johnson

customer_reviews.title: love it, But it was damaged by UPS the ...
customer_reviews.text: love it, But it was damaged by UPS the box looked like it was thrown and kicked around. when we took it out of the box it was damaged.
customer_reviews.author: glenda sanchez

customer_reviews.title: We are sad.
customer_reviews.text: We notice a hot plastic smell. We have run it several times for about 15 minutes each time. But it still emits a ver distinctive smell. In an RV, that is overwhelming. Not sure what to do. We bought a warranty. Not sure if it applies. We are sad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Antique Mantle Receives New Life!
customer_reviews.text: I placed the insert inside of an old fireplace mantle I had just sitting up against a wall in our basement family room. It looks amazing and so warm and cozy. We heat with wood so I have no need for the heater option. Only use it for the pretty flames!
customer_reviews.author: coffeediva

customer_reviews.title: I was really bumped because I thought it would warm ...
customer_reviews.text: I was really bumped because I thought it would warm my small living room but it doesn't, at least not as much i had hoped for. I will be return it.
customer_reviews.author: Roxana

customer_reviews.title: Loved this, it is very pretty
customer_reviews.text: Loved this, it is very pretty. We have gotten many compliments on it. We decided to take the glass off from ours so it didn't look so much like a tv with the reflections in the glass. It has different settings to use. It even has one so the logs go dim and bright along with the flame getting smaller and bigger at the same time. When you shut the unit off the logs stay lit up and slowing "burn" out just like real embers do. Wish it had the crackling sound but that would not be a deal breaker on buying this unit. Great heat too.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent construction and overall appearance. Meets or exceeds mfg claims.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Busch

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with the look and quality of this electric fireplace
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the look and quality of this electric fireplace. I've not used it yet for heat but like the look of it when on for visual effect only. Flame looks pretty realistic. The only complaint I have is how loud it beeps when you turn it on and change settings.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce M. Bales

customer_reviews.title: Limited Temp settings
customer_reviews.text: Came in good working order and delivery on time. It looks really nice. We like the adjustable fire (light). My mom love the fireplace atmosphere, now she wants an electric fireplace Information to consider: - Limited temperature settings, steps up 71, 75, 78, 82, 86, to 99 degrees. Not able to temp to specific temp, like 72 degrees. - Fan is ON or OFF not variable. Can't turn the fan up to circulate the heat faster/further.
customer_reviews.author: KarenB

customer_reviews.title: This worked great for about a year then no flames anymore
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for about a year then no flames anymore. The heater still works but no flames at all now. When there was flame they were OK but it seemed like one of those old machine that had pictures on a loop that was rolling around inside of it. This item pictured was not the until I received. This one pictured has a nuck cooler looking flame effect.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Z

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Christmas Gift!
customer_reviews.text: This fireplace was a Christmas gift from my husband, and I love it! The plan was to build a faux fireplace according to some plans he'd found online, but he took it a step further. This unit works great, and the fire and logs look pretty realistic, as well. I love that it has a remote and timer function. The heater blower is a bit loud though. Overall, I'm more than pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Nik H.

customer_reviews.title: I love this fireplace!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great addition to our home. The fireplace is beautiful and provides a lot of warmth too.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: Unit looks good overall but it developed a click noise after a few uses. Not impressed with the look of the flames. The heat output is only supplemental to existing heat source. Don’t expect much warmth. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Nice Fireplace
customer_reviews.text: Really nice heater and really nice size and display. No, it is not a real fireplace, but the price is right. I dinged it a star for the fact that the remote didn't work out of the box. I actually emailed the seller and he did respond quickly and graciously (so, kudos to them). By that time though, I had repaired the defective remote (I couldn't just let it sit there being broken, could I? ;-)

customer_reviews.title: Realistic feel with nice heat output.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my parents and they absolutely love it. Heat is nice for a small room and the lights are realistic, and give a nice glow especially when behind a fireplace screen. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: E. Tac

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful, little heat!
customer_reviews.text: The fireplace is beautiful when turned on. Very disappointed by the amount of heat it produced (even on highest setting!). Ended up returning it because of that. If you're looking for one for looks, it's perfect. If you want the heat factor as well, I do not recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel1285

customer_reviews.title: In very bad condition when received
customer_reviews.text: In very bad condition when received. The faux wood was broken in two parts and a lot of dents to outside metal case. You can tell it had been through a lot. Had to return it...
customer_reviews.author: Mmahabir

customer_reviews.title: Thermostat not very good
customer_reviews.text: I liked the product very much. Two thing need improvement: 1. The thermostat is not working, the heat is continually coming. I use in house central heating together with this but it never stopped heating. 2. The fan is slow and heating capacity is not good enough to warm my 15x20 room.
customer_reviews.author: Upendra Purush Dahal

customer_reviews.title: Ordered just after Christmas and LOVE it.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered just after Christmas and LOVE it.. First it is beautiful.... Easy to operate and puts out heat.. It really has transformed my fireplace area. Cannot wait until fall to turn it on again..........
customer_reviews.author: Venita T.

customer_reviews.title: Total Satisfaction!
customer_reviews.text: I'm simply thrilled with the Fireplace. Of course nothing can be as real as a real fire but this is an excellent simulation. I recommend it highly!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. L. M. Wangberg

customer_reviews.title: We’re very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly as advertised and fit the opening in our camper perfectly. We’re very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Zuby Boulware

customer_reviews.title: Best Electric fireplace for your RV
customer_reviews.text: We installed this in our 5th wheel, much better then original one that was in our rv to begin with, love the settings up to 8 hours run time if you need it, heats our 5th wheel up to desired temp and saves propane.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Cate

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful design.
customer_reviews.text: It’s too hot to use it now, but I like that the heat comes out of the top. I love that it comes with a small remote.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Cervantes

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this heater. It's just the right size, it puts out great heat and it's very economical.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy W Miller

customer_reviews.title: good buy!
customer_reviews.text: quiet operation...creates nice atmosphere....easy plug and play install....be sure you measure the fireplace opening right...it was a tight fit for me vertically to get in....took some wiggling, but once in, works great...nice to have a remote to use from sofa!
customer_reviews.author: TAHOE PJ

customer_reviews.title: Good to go
customer_reviews.text: I have not use this a lot so far but what I have used of it at this point I am real satisfied with.
customer_reviews.author: Piddlerdude

customer_reviews.title: Electric fire
customer_reviews.text: Love this fireplace, lots of compliments,it is a little small for the opening,but close. Realistic,a little noisy but not bad.great item for the price and arrived quicker then expected.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Keeping me warm!
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it on the lowest heat setting so far and it definitely keeps the chill out. It looks nice on. Still reads as fake but has a pleasant glow. I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Measurements are incorrect.
customer_reviews.text: The fireplace itself is very nice and seems to be good quality. The problem is that the measurements are inaccurate. All the measurements are correct except the height measurement that says its 23". That measurement is actually 23.3" and therefore we have to send ours back as it does not fit. And the seller will not pay for the return, we have to. Unfair since the measurements are wrong. I thought I would share this information as measurements are critically important when buying a product on line.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Looks legitimately realistic!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy with this purchase. Many of our guests always ask if this is real because it looks like a legitimate fireplace. It does a great job heating up our living room too!
customer_reviews.author: Blugems

customer_reviews.title: We just love it. It looks and feels like a real ...
customer_reviews.text: We just love it. It looks and feels like a real fire and fits perfectly in our fireplace.
customer_reviews.author: Pam in Arizona

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love everything about this heater works amazing and it looks so real.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice
customer_reviews.text: Much better than our previous one and with a great warranty. The remote control is excellent and works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: TERESA P WEIERMAN

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: I built a new mantle for it and it looks excellent. I wanted to post the photo but cannot figure out how to do it.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: not only fit the existing hole perfectly it really works great, and just in time for the coming winter ...
customer_reviews.text: The AKDY 28, not only fit the existing hole perfectly it really works great, and just in time for the coming winter months.
customer_reviews.author: Harry K.

customer_reviews.title: For the price you can't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: Flame effect is best when turned down, but the audio beep is to loud
customer_reviews.author: John R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I just love this. Turn it on and instant heat. Would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Rehn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is awesome to take the chill off the room and enjoy fire
customer_reviews.author: tazz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super looking fireplace......easy installation and makes the room look marvelous~
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my house warm and looks beautiful tucked in the mantle
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my house warm and looks beautiful tucked in the mantle. I have it in a larger open dining room and it heats more than I thought it would. However, I don't think I will ever order a piece like this online again, because it arrived scratched and a screw was knocked out of the inside base. I consider myself lucky it worked at all and didn't had to go through the complicated return process.
customer_reviews.author: AnnetteMarie

customer_reviews.title: Great product poor quality assurance
customer_reviews.text: When recieved it had some shipping damage but was well packed. Likely the manufacturer damaged it before shipping. Once installed I noticed the faux brick decoration was missing on one side behind the glass front. Clearly obvious if they had any form of quality control. I just expected more for what I paid. Other than that it looks good and heater works properly.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Buckman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value and Great Look
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, great looking product. Heat is good for smaller rooms. I would recommend this product to others and I would buy another one in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Ryanna

customer_reviews.title: Solid Electric Fireplace
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It's electric and the flame is what you'd expect if not a bit better. Best parts are. It's plug and play, light, quiet and warm! BOOM!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, however wish I had known when it ...
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Nice product, however wish I had known when it was to be shipped.
customer_reviews.author: justinnov

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: This is company that stands behind their customer service, I have never order from them in the past however chose them with my fireplace choice and even though I had shipping carrier issue Akdy stood behind their service and went above and beyond to satisfy the customer. Getting back to the basics!!
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Hagen

product_meta.title: AKDY 27" Electric Fireplace Freestanding Brown Wooden Mantel Firebox 3D Flame w/Logs Heater
product_meta.description:
Note: This item is not available for SHIPPING TO AK, HI, and PR. OR APO.FPO.DPO. 

This AKDY 27 electric wooden mantel fireplace brings warmth, comfort and safety into your home. A beautiful array of 3D Flames and logs that give you the feeling of coziness. Turn on the electric fireplace mantel and get a warm ambience with a reach of 400 sq.ft. Sit in comfort, while reading your favorite novel and enjoy your evening, cozy, over a well-lit LED fire. Safety thermal cut-off is built-in to prevent overheating for a more secure experience.

Dimension: 26.8 W x 30.3 H x 12.6 D
Unit Color: Black (Brown Wooden Mantel)
Heating Area (Sq. Ft.): 400 sq.ft.
Heat Level Setting: 1
Watts: 1400W
Voltage(V): 120V/60Hz
Adjustable Flame: No
Flame Operational w/o Heat: Yes
Bulb Type: LED
LED Color: Red
Installation: Free Standing
Vent Direction: Front
Control: Buttons
Remote Control: No
Timer Function: No
Front Style: Flat Front
Fuel Bed: Logs
Wiring: Plug-n-Play
Safety Shut Off: Yes
Approval: US & Canada CSA Certified
Warranty: 1-Year Parts Warranty
feature_bullets: Dimension: 26.8 W x 30.3 H x 12.6 D

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars148 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
